q_ch: 2024年6月1日后的缝纫任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the sewing tasks after June 1, 2024?

steps.description: To find the sewing tasks that started after June 1, 2024, we need to query the sewing_tasks table for tasks with a start_time greater than June 1, 2024.

response:
Sure thing! Here are the sewing tasks that are scheduled to start after June 1, 2024. Let's take a look at the details:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Working Group ID | Order Product ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|--------|
| 32      | June 17, 2024       | July 14, 2024       | 9                | 32               | 150            | 0                | 0      |
| 33      | July 17, 2024       | August 3, 2024      | 8                | 33               | 120            | 0                | 0      |
| 34      | July 10, 2024       | July 20, 2024       | 10               | 34               | 330            | 0                | 0      |

These tasks are all set to kick off after June 1, 2024. If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! 😊
